text: 4:17 Jems 2:13; 1 Jon 2:28; 3:3; 3:19-21Tuavir kamɨn, e fo, God e gifongezɨ, e God ko gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongezɨ, ifofer arazir kam bar e gizɨvaghtɨma, an daghem otivam. Kamaghɨn gumazamiziba bar Godɨn kotiamɨn tuivamin dughiam, e atiatingan kogham. E nguazir kamɨn itir dughiam e Iesusɨn mɨn ikiam, kamaghɨn e gɨn Godɨn atiatingan kogham.
